amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for periodic censuses and programs by $12 million and increases funding for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the purpose of weather research by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Periodic Censuses and Programs by $12 million and to increase funding for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the purpose of weather research by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bridenstine amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 340 - 71 (Roll no. 245).
